languages.text: Эти орудия сотворены дерзкими ремесленниками из загадочных механизмов войны эльдаров, обнаруженных при раскопках на Янусе. Пусть оригинальную их конструкцию воспроизвести не удалось, но древние машины преобразились в скорострельные и разрушительные орудия, обрушивающие ярость Империума на нечестивцев.

These weapons were created by daring artisans from mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavations on Janus. Efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into devastating rapid-fire weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.
languages.original_text: Эти орудия сотворены дерзкими ремесленниками из загадочных механизмов войны эльдаров, обнаруженных при раскопках на Янусе. Пусть оригинальную их конструкцию воспроизвести не удалось, но древние машины преобразились в скорострельные и разрушительные орудия, обрушивающие ярость Империума на нечестивцев.

traits.locale_text: These weapons were created by brazen craftsmen out of mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavation on Janus. Their efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into rapid-firing and devastating weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.

These weapons were created by brazen craftsmen out of mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavation on Janus. Their efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into rapid-firing and devastating weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.

These weapons were created by daring craftsmen from mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavations on Janus. Efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into devastating rapid-fire weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.

These weapons were created by daring craftsmen from mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavations on Janus. Efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into devastating rapid-fire weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.

These weapons were created by daring artisans from mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavations on Janus. Efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into devastating rapid-fire weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.

languages.text: Estas armas fueron creadas por artesanos audaces a partir de misteriosas máquinas de guerra Aeldari descubiertas en una excavación en Janus. Los esfuerzos por replicar el diseño original han fallado, pero las antiguas máquinas se han transformado en devastadoras armas de disparo rápido que traerán la cólera del Imperium sobre los malvados.
languages.original_text: These weapons were created by daring artisans from mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavations on Janus. Efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into devastating rapid-fire weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.

traits.locale_text: Estas armas fueron creadas por artesanos audaces a partir de misteriosas máquinas de guerra Aeldari descubiertas en una excavación en Janus. Los esfuerzos por replicar el diseño original han fallado, pero las antiguas máquinas se han transformado en devastadoras armas de disparo rápido que traerán la cólera del Imperium sobre los malvados.

languages.text: Ces armes ont été créées par des artisans audacieux, à partir de mystérieux mécanismes de guerre aeldaris mis au jour lors de fouilles sur Janus. Si tous les efforts visant à reproduire le modèle original ont échoué, ces antiques machines ont cependant été transformées en armes dévastatrices, dont la cadence de tir élevée ne laissera aucune chance aux ennemis de l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: These weapons were created by daring artisans from mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavations on Janus. Efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into devastating rapid-fire weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.

traits.locale_text: Ces armes ont été créées par des artisans audacieux, à partir de mystérieux mécanismes de guerre aeldaris mis au jour lors de fouilles sur Janus. Si tous les efforts visant à reproduire le modèle original ont échoué, ces antiques machines ont cependant été transformées en armes dévastatrices, dont la cadence de tir élevée ne laissera aucune chance aux ennemis de l'Imperium.

languages.text: 这些武器由胆大包天的工匠师设计而成，借鉴了挖掘加努斯遗迹时发现艾达灵族战争装置。尽管未能完美复原艾达灵族的神秘装置，但这些远古装置依然被改造成毁灭性的高射速武器，化作帝国的怒火，降临到邪恶身上。
languages.original_text: These weapons were created by daring artisans from mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavations on Janus. Efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into devastating rapid-fire weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.

traits.locale_text: 这些武器由胆大包天的工匠师设计而成，借鉴了挖掘加努斯遗迹时发现艾达灵族战争装置。尽管未能完美复原艾达灵族的神秘装置，但这些远古装置依然被改造成毁灭性的高射速武器，化作帝国的怒火，降临到邪恶身上。

languages.text: この武器は、ヤヌスの発掘調査で発見された謎のアエルダリ戦争機構をもとに、大胆な職人たちによって作られた。元の設計を再現する努力は失敗したかもしれないが、それでも古代の機械は強力な速射兵器に生まれ変わった。邪悪なる者へと、帝国の怒りをしかと叩きつけるであろう。
languages.original_text: These weapons were created by daring artisans from mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavations on Janus. Efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into devastating rapid-fire weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.

traits.locale_text: この武器は、ヤヌスの発掘調査で発見された謎のアエルダリ戦争機構をもとに、大胆な職人たちによって作られた。元の設計を再現する努力は失敗したかもしれないが、それでも古代の機械は強力な速射兵器に生まれ変わった。邪悪なる者へと、帝国の怒りをしかと叩きつけるであろう。

languages.text: Diese Waffen wurden von kühnen Artifexen aus Aeldari-Kriegsmechanismen geschaffen, die bei Ausgrabungsarbeiten auf Janus entdeckt wurden. Die Bemühungen, die ursprünglichen Waffen originalgetreu nachzubauen, sind zwar gescheitert. Die uralten Maschinen wurden aber dennoch in verheerende Schnellfeuerwaffen verwandelt, die alle Feinde garantiert den Zorn des Imperiums spüren lassen.
languages.original_text: These weapons were created by daring artisans from mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavations on Janus. Efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into devastating rapid-fire weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.

traits.locale_text: Diese Waffen wurden von kühnen Artifexen aus Aeldari-Kriegsmechanismen geschaffen, die bei Ausgrabungsarbeiten auf Janus entdeckt wurden. Die Bemühungen, die ursprünglichen Waffen originalgetreu nachzubauen, sind zwar gescheitert. Die uralten Maschinen wurden aber dennoch in verheerende Schnellfeuerwaffen verwandelt, die alle Feinde garantiert den Zorn des Imperiums spüren lassen.

languages.text: Bu silahlar, yürekli zanaatkârlar tarafından Janus'taki kazılar sırasında keşfedilen gizemli Aeldari savaş mekanizmalarından imal edilmiştir. Orijinal tasarımlarını kopyalama çabaları sonuçsuz kalsa da kadim makineler, İmparatorluk'un gazabını alçakların tepesine yağdıracağı muhakkak olan yıkıcı seri atar silahlara dönüştürülmüştür.
languages.original_text: These weapons were created by daring artisans from mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavations on Janus. Efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into devastating rapid-fire weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.
